'''Chocolate''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Chocolate can be found in an [[Exquisite Chest]] in the [["Children of Echoes"]].

Depending on the quality, Chocolate restores '''70'''/'''85'''/'''100''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Xilonen|Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies}}

==Trivia==
* The description of this food may be a reference to a line from 1994 comedy-drama movie ''{{w|Forrest Gump}}''. The line in question is "My mama always said: 'Life is like a box of chocolates: You never know what you're gonna get.'"
* It is one of Xilonen's favourite food.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Xilonen|Favorite Food}}</ref>
* The history and origins of {{w|History of chocolate|Chocolate}} as a beverage in Mesoamerica are referenced in the [[food]] item ''[[Xocoatl]]''.

===Etymology===
* Chocolate was introduced by the Aztecs to the Spanish. The word chocolate, comes from the {{w|Nahuatl}} word ''{{wt|chocolatl|Xocolatl}}'', meaning "bitter water."
